item.description:
Location: Worcester Polytechnic Institute, Worcester, MA

EMPLOYERS- Attend WPI's annual Biotechnology & Bioengineering Career Fair!

SPACE IS LIMITEDâ€“ Please note that this is a first come, first serve registration. The attendees are WPI students and alumni.

10:00am-Noon Check In & Set up

11:30am Luncheon

Noon-4:00 pm Career Fair

Registration: https://wpi-csm.sympl...

For more information about the WPI Career Fairs please visit: http://www.wpi.edu/Ad...

For more information about the WPI student population, please visit: http://www.wpi.edu/of.... If you have questions, please contact the Career Development Center at 508-831-5260 or email employer@wpi.edu. We look forward to seeing you!
